articles.title: Spirit And American Airlines Canceled Hundreds Of Flights, Frustrating Passengers - NPR
articles.description: The airlines cited weather and staffing challenges. The industry has had trouble meeting the demand as people are ready to travel again.
articles.content:
A Spirit Airlines jet seen approaching Philadelphia International Airport earlier this year.
Matt Rourke/AP
